name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building scalable backend systems and AI-powered tools.
13 years turning ideas into working software. I care about tools that solve real problems, not just interesting engineering puzzles.
My approach: start with the problem, ship fast, iterate based on real usage. Technical depth where it matters, pragmatism everywhere else.

Built obsidian-open-gate (222 stars) for Obsidian web integration, jira-mcp (79 stars) for AI-Jira workflows, and google-mcp (20 stars) for Google services. Most proud of work that helps developers ship faster.
Side projects at aiocean.io (Clik, real-time systems), writing at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus. Founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016.
Go, TypeScript, MCP. Backend systems, developer tooling, AI integrations. Focus on real-time systems and making complex things simple.
